import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import GameSection from "./GamePage/GameSection"; function Instructions() { let randFour = [10, 5, 4, 4]; let randCard = ["spade", "spade", "spade", "heart"] let image = require("../images/instructions.png"); return (



Instructions

Use the four cards to make the number 24 by using
addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.




Below is how you would use the game interface
